name: Eternal Damnation
description:
This is an atrocious piece of media I'm ashamed to call a game. It's easily my most poorly made project and it's barely playable. I started development on it a year or two ago and never really finished it.  Numerous people have played it and said it was super challenging, and I saw potential in that so I slapped a name on it, gave it some cover art and here it is.

No music, no sounds, nothing. Just enjoy the feeling of pure rage and anguish coursing through your being. :)

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys for all movement.
